Shopping.title: Jaipur Bazaars
Shopping.description: Explore the vibrant markets of Jaipur, known for textiles, jewelry, and handicrafts.

Shopping.title: Udaipur Markets
Shopping.description: Beautiful markets offering traditional Rajasthani crafts and local specialties.

Street Foods.title: Pyaaz Kachori
Street Foods.description: Crispy fried pastry filled with spiced onions, a Rajasthan street food favorite.

Street Foods.title: Dal Baati Churma
Street Foods.description: Traditional Rajasthani dish served on streets, a must-try delicacy.

Restaurants.title: Chokhi Dhani
Restaurants.description: Authentic Rajasthani thali experience in a traditional village setting.

Hotels.title: Heritage Palace Hotels
Hotels.description: Stay in converted palaces offering royal experiences and traditional architecture.

Beaches.title: Desert Dunes
Beaches.description: Experience the golden sand dunes of the Thar Desert, especially beautiful at sunset.

Deserts.title: Thar Desert
Deserts.description: The Great Indian Desert offering camel safaris and stunning desert landscapes.

Forts.title: Mehrangarh Fort
Forts.description: Massive fort overlooking Jodhpur, one of India's largest and most impressive forts.

Forts.title: Amer Fort
Forts.description: Magnificent fort palace with intricate architecture and stunning views of Jaipur.

Palaces.title: City Palace
Palaces.description: Royal residence in the heart of Jaipur, showcasing Rajput architecture and artifacts.

Palaces.title: Lake Palace
Palaces.description: Stunning white marble palace floating on Lake Pichola in Udaipur.

Festivals.title: Pushkar Camel Fair
Festivals.description: World's largest camel fair featuring cultural performances, trading, and festivities.

Dances.title: Ghoomar Dance
Dances.description: Traditional Rajasthani folk dance performed by women in colorful ghaghra-cholis.

Secret Destinations.title: Kumbhalgarh Wildlife Sanctuary
Secret Destinations.description: Off-the-beaten-path sanctuary with ancient fort and diverse wildlife.

Beaches.title: Kovalam Beach
Beaches.description: Famous crescent-shaped beach with lighthouse views and calm waters.

Waterfalls.title: Athirappilly Falls
Waterfalls.description: The Niagara of India, a stunning waterfall in the Western Ghats.

Shopping.title: Spice Markets
Shopping.description: Discover aromatic spices and traditional Kerala products in local markets.

Beaches.title: Calangute Beach
Beaches.description: Queen of Beaches with golden sand and vibrant beach shacks.

Street Foods.title: Goan Fish Curry
Street Foods.description: Authentic Goan seafood available at beachside shacks and local eateries.
